Actions.Name: Liminal Darts
Actions.Description: Mark a foe in line of sight and range 10. At the end of that character's turn, it takes [D] piercing damage twice if it's not in cover from the Life Hunter. Then this mark ends.

Actions.Name: Life Seeking Arrow
Actions.CriticalHit: Deals 75% of the foe's max HP instead.
Actions.Effect: Ignores cover. Cannot target adjacent characters.
Actions.SpecialRecharge: Recharges only if Nock is used.
